title: ShadowPilot
description: FastAPI service that analyzes politician insider-trading filings, with a web dashboard for portfolio visibility.
longDescription: Built a FastAPI service that analyzes politician insider-trading filings and generates trade signals
Implemented ingestion, de-duplication, trade filtering, pricing enrichment, and order execution via Alpaca, with guardrails and run-now admin controls
Exposed a single-page portfolio dashboard and persisted raw trades, signals, orders, fills, and daily snapshots for attribution
Manages a real portfolio of $200
